IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 12:40 IST
 Indian Institute of Technology
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Madhya Pradesh |  Salary : 37,000 to 42,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Institute of Technology Indore (IIT Indore) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the IIT Indore Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Madhya Pradesh.

IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Research Fellow	01	M.E./M. Tech in Civil Engineering

IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 23 Years.
The maximum age limit: 33 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview..

IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 37,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 42,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the IIT Indore Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Attach the required documents to the resume.
Send the documents to the mentioned e-mail address.

E-mail Address:

schaudhary@iiti.ac.in.

Important Dates:

Starting date	23-08-2025
Closing date	29-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
